title: Hotwire
description: A 3D puzzle game built in Unity for Kiwijam 2025, featuring active ragdoll physics and rope-based mechanics.

title: Cafe Kiosk UI
description: A Figma prototype of a self-ordering cafe kiosk with features like member login, menu browsing, item customisation, and a checkout flow.

title: DeskTop Pet Project
description: Bring your desktop to life with this animated companion. An overlay of a dancing character dancing, adding a touch of fun to your workspace.
